DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate efficacy oral contraceptive continuous fashion versus usual cyclic fashion recurrence endometriosis relate symptom endometriomas follow fertility-sparing surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Continuous Versus Cyclic Oral Contraceptives Endometriosis
DOC.detailed_description: Oral contraceptive contain 0.03 mg ethinyl estradiol 3mg drospirenone administer . One tablet day 21 day follow 7 day pill free ( cyclic fashion ) one tablet day continuous fashion .
DOC.criteria: Women reproductive age Symptomatic endometriosis follow fertility spar surgery Contraindications use oral contraceptive
